NAME.Nominative: Monday of the Fifth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Monday of the Fifth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 3<sup>rd</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: For our iniquities are risen against us, arise, O Lord, help us: for Thou art our Father, for we know none other beside Thee.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Even Thine altars, O Lord of hosts
SEXTE.STICHOS: How beloved are Thy dwellings, O Lord of hosts.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 8<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Show us, O Lord, Thy mercy
and Thy salvation do Thou give unto us.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Thou hast been gracious, O Lord, unto Thy land; Thou hast turned back the captivity of Jacob.
